sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit, a unique identifier for the product

fnsku.description: Fulfillment Network SKU, a unique identifier for a product in Amazon's fulfillment network

asin.description: Unique Amazon Standard Identification Number for the product

product-name.description: The name or title of the product

condition.description: The condition of the product (e.g., New, Used, Refurbished)

your-price.description: The price at which you are selling the product

mfn-listing-exists.description: Indicator if the Merchant Fulfilled Network listing exists

mfn-fulfillable-quantity.description: The quantity of Merchant Fulfilled Network inventory available for sale

afn-listing-exists.description: Indicator if the FBA listing exists on Amazon's marketplace

afn-warehouse-quantity.description: The quantity of FBA inventory stored in Amazon's warehouses

afn-fulfillable-quantity.description: The quantity of Fulfillable FBA inventory available for sale at Amazon's fulfillment centers

afn-unsellable-quantity.description: The quantity of FBA inventory that is unsellable or unavailable for purchase

afn-reserved-quantity.description: The quantity of FBA inventory reserved for pending orders

afn-total-quantity.description: The total quantity of FBA inventory available, including fulfillable, reserved, and unsellable quantities

per-unit-volume.description: The volume of the product per unit

afn-inbound-working-quantity.description: The quantity of FBA inventory being processed and prepared for sale

afn-inbound-shipped-quantity.description: The quantity of FBA inventory shipped to Amazon but not yet received

afn-inbound-receiving-quantity.description: The quantity of FBA inventory currently being received by Amazon's fulfillment centers

afn-researching-quantity.description: The quantity of FBA inventory being actively researched or investigated

afn-reserved-future-supply.description: The quantity of FBA inventory reserved for future supply transactions

afn-future-supply-buyable.description: The quantity of FBA inventory that is on order but not yet received by Amazon

dataEndTime.description: The date and time when the inventory data was last updated
